ud5.1:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
ud5.1:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikāya deviyā saddhiṁ uparipāsādavaragato hoti.
ud5.1:1.4_0: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikaṁ deviṁ etadavoca:
ud5.1:1.5_0: “atthi nu kho te, mallike, kocañño attanā piyataro”ti?
ud5.1:2.1_0: “Natthi kho me, mahārāja, kocañño attanā piyataro.
ud5.1:2.2_0: Tuyhaṁ pana, mahārāja, atthañño koci attanā piyataro”ti?
ud5.1:2.3_0: “Mayhampi kho, mallike, natthañño koci attanā piyataro”ti.
ud5.1:3.1_0: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo pāsādā orohitvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud5.1:3.2_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
ud5.1:4.1_0: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, mallikāya deviyā saddhiṁ uparipāsādavaragato mallikaṁ deviṁ etadavocaṁ:
ud5.1:4.2_0: ‘atthi nu kho te, mallike, kocañño attanā piyataro’ti?
ud5.1:4.3_0: Evaṁ vutte, mallikā devī maṁ etadavoca:
ud5.1:4.4_0: ‘natthi kho me, mahārāja, kocañño attanā piyataro.
ud5.1:4.5_0: Tuyhaṁ pana, mahārāja, atthañño koci attanā piyataro’ti?
ud5.1:4.6_0: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, mallikaṁ deviṁ etadavocaṁ:
ud5.1:4.7_0: ‘mayhampi kho, mallike, natthañño koci attanā piyataro’”ti.
ud5.1:5.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
